preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clinlims.status_of_sample WHERE name = 'SampleDisposed' AND status_type = 'SAMPLE'

changeSet.comment: Add SampleDisposed status for sample item disposal tracking (OGC-73)
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO clinlims.status_of_sample (id, description, code, status_type, name, display_key, is_active, lastupdated) VALUES (24, 'Sample has been physically disposed', 1, 'SAMPLE', 'SampleDisposed', 'status.sample.disposed', 'Y', NOW()) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET name = EXCLUDED.name, description = EXCLUDED.description, status_type = EXCLUDED.status_type, display_key = EXCLUDED.display_key, is_active = EXCLUDED.is_active, lastupdated = NOW();
SELECT setval('clinlims.status_of_sample_seq', GREATEST(24::bigint, COALESCE((SELECT MAX(id) FROM clinlims.status_of_sample), 0)::bigint), true);
